expo.name: SonicBoost ProLite
expo.description: Enhance your audio with AI-powered mastering. One-click audio enhancement for musicians, podcasters, and content creators.

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SonicBoost needs access to your microphone to record and enhance audio in real-time.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SonicBoost needs access to your photo library to import audio files for enhancement.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: SonicBoost needs permission to save your enhanced audio files to your photo library.
